actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize the District of Columbia Council to provide for an increase in compensation for teachers and others in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Teachers' Salary Act - Authorizes the District of Columbia Council to provide for an increase in compensation for teachers and other educational personnel in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the District of Columbia Council to provide for an increase in compensation for teachers and others in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
